segments.text: I'll need a parking permit for next semester .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you attend school during the day or only at night ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I only attend class part-time in the evenings .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you drive a motorcycle or an automobile ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have both , but I usually use my car to get to school .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great , the price for that permit is thirty dollars ; cash , check , or credit card ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you need to buy a duplicate permit for a second vehicle ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , here is your permit ; enjoy the next semester .
segments.speaker: S2
